short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Donate to charity (of your choice) as you shop on Amazon without paying out-of-pocket!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ready to do some good for the society?

Every time you make a purchase on smile.amazon.com, a part of your purchase is donated to a charity of your choice. You pick the charity when you sign up for Amazon Smile program. There's no fee to enter the program and you don't pay anything extra when purchasing through Amazon Smile. So why not do some good work in the process? The more you shop, the more your charity gets.
